function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Indoor transmission of contagious diseases such as influenza A and SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of the virus in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Implementing appropriate ventilation, filtration, and UVGI measures","Technologies":"UVGI air disinfection, HVAC systems, ventilation, filtration","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff in indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Close contact in indoor environments leading to infectious clusters","Impact":"High likelihood of disease transmission in crowded indoor spaces with minimal ventilation","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation rates, implementing UVGI, and reducing indoor crowding","Technologies":"HVAC systems, UVGI air disinfection, ventilation systems","People":"Individuals in crowded indoor spaces such as fitness gyms, restaurants, clubs, and healthcare facilities","Owner":"Organizations managing indoor spaces, public health authorities"}]}
